/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the cityscape.
